items.text: slower ball, ends up as a full toss, but he doesn't time his cover drive well
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText:
Monjur Elahi: "@Sean There is a proverb that goes, 'Slow and steady, wins the race'. Very correct with Cricket especially. The target is not massive and not loosing early wickets is key here."

rijvyBD: "@sean: its quite a difficult condition for them. it will take some time to adjust. the approach of not losing wicket early is working good here. :)"
items.text: full outside off again, goes on one knee to square drive it past point
items.shortText: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, driven past cover
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: digs it in short and pacy, surprised Sarkar with the bounce and pace, he manages to get his bat horizontal and run it down to third man from close to his body
items.shortText: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, steered to point
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, tapped towards short third man, wanted the single but sent back - correctly - by Sarkar
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: too far down leg and the keeper tries to stop it with his pads but it rolls off and they take a single too, to add to the extra
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, 2 wides

items.text: full on the stumps, almost yorker length, defended back
items.shortText: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: length on off, gets on his toes and defends to point
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length, angled across, extra bounce for Holder and Tamim gets a bit of a leading edge to the off side, all along the ground, however
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length outside off, steered to third-man
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: length angled across, has a poke at it and misses
items.shortText: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: length outside off, another tentative poke and beaten again
items.shortText: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: length outside off, a bit more room there and this time cuts it nicely, beats point and then beats third-man diving to his right as well
items.shortText: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs
Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs
Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length, angled in, gets on his toes to ride the extra bounce, pushes it towards covers and they scamper a single
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, no run
Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs
Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run
Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run
Holder to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: length around the hip, tucked away towards squareleg for one
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: length, angled across, Sarkar presents half a bat again and is beaten outside off
items.shortText: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: length, angled across again, steers it past gully and down to third-man for one
items.shortText: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: short outside off, Tamim rides the bounce and steers it to gully
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run
